scenario.name: Basic Sipstone UAC
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:receiver@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: receiver <sip:receiver@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test X-Twilio-Token: asdfasdfasdf Content-Type: io.sipstack.application.application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 98 97 a=rtpmap:98 speex/16000 a=rtpmap:97 speex/8000

CANCEL sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port][$1] From: sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port];tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Contact: sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] CANCEL Max-Forwards: 70

ACK sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port][$1] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[$2] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] ACK Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0
